MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY17 postcode area of Caersws, affecting properties in Clatter, Llanwnog and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.59am. Our emergency response team is currently carrying out investigations to locate the fault on the overhead network. We now expect the power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm.We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.36am on 11th of Jan 2021.
